title: Compiling a reading list of articles that review NLP research up to 2021 can provide a comprehensive overview of the field's development, challenges, and future directions. Hereâ€™s a list of 20 articles and papers that are influential or provide significant insights into NLP research
Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding"** by Jacob Devlin et al
note: - A foundational paper introducing BERT, which has significantly influenced NLP research.

title: **"Attention is All You Need"** by Ashish Vaswani et al
- Introduces the Transformer model, which has become a cornerstone in NLP
**"A Survey of the Usages of Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing"** by Young et al
- A comprehensive survey of deep learning techniques in NLP
**"Natural Language Processing (Almost) from Scratch"** by Ronan Collobert et al
- Discusses early deep learning approaches to NLP
**"Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing: A Review"** by Li Deng and Yang Liu
note: - Reviews the impact of deep learning on NLP.

title: **"Recent Trends in Deep Learning Based Natural Language Processing"** by Zhang et al
- An overview of recent advancements in NLP using deep learning
**"A Survey on Recent Advances in Natural Language Processing"** by Qiu et al
- Discusses recent progress and challenges in NLP
**"Pre-trained Models for Natural Language Processing: A Survey"** by Qiu et al
- Reviews the development and impact of pre-trained models in NLP
**"The State of the Art in End-to-End Natural Language Processing"** by Manning et al
- Provides insights into the state of NLP research and applications
**"A Survey on Text Classification: From Shallow to Deep Learning"** by Kowsari et al
- Reviews methods for text classification in NLP
**"A Survey of Evaluation Metrics Used for NLG Systems"** by Celikyilmaz et al
- Discusses evaluation metrics for natural language generation
**"A Survey on Sentiment Analysis: Challenges and Applications"** by Ravi et al
- Reviews sentiment analysis techniques and their applications
**"A Survey on Aspect-Based Sentiment Analysis: Tasks, Methods, and Challenges"** by Zhang et al
**"A Survey on Neural Network-Based Summarization Methods"** by Dong et al
- Reviews neural network approaches to text summarization
**"A Survey on Dialogue Systems: Recent Advances and New Frontiers"** by Gao et al
- Discusses the development of dialogue systems
**"A Survey on Knowledge Graphs: Representation, Acquisition, and Applications"** by Hogan et al
- Reviews the role of knowledge graphs in NLP
**"A Survey on Multimodal Sentiment Analysis"** by Poria et al
- Explores sentiment analysis across multiple modalities
**"A Survey on Cross-Lingual Word Embedding Models"** by Ruder et al
- Discusses models for cross-lingual word embeddings

author.literal: **"A Survey on Neural Machine Translation"** by Bahdanau et al.

note: - Reviews neural approaches to machine translation.

title: **"A Survey on Text Generation: From Deep Learning Models to Applications"** by Lu et al
- Discusses text generation techniques and applications
These articles and papers provide a broad overview of the field, covering foundational models, surveys of specific subfields, and discussions on the challenges and future directions in NLP research
